data.title: Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures 2015 Preview
data.meta_description: What a great lineup from Disney Studios for 2015 movies! Here's a summary lineup... what are you most excited to see?
data.text:
Here’s a recap for you of what to expect from Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures in 2015. It’s a toss up for me on what I’m most excited to see… the breathtaking “Cinderella“, the clever and funny “Inside Out”, or the certain-to-be-legendary “Star Wars: The Force Awakens”.

(Ok, I’m a big Star Wars geek… it’s probably that last one!)

Which new Walt Disney Studios Motion Picture are you most excited to see this year?

Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures 2015 Preview

McFarland, USA (Disney)

http://movies.disney.com/ mcfarland-usa

Rating: PG

Release Date: February 20, 2015

Cinderella (Disney)

Website: http://www.disney.com/ Cinderella

Rating: PG

Release date: March 13, 2015

Monkey Kingdom (Disneynature)

Website: http://nature.disney.com/ monkey-kingdom

Rating: NR

Release date: April 17, 2015

Avengers: Age of Ultron (Marvel)

Website: marvel.com/avengers

Rating: TBD

U.S. Release date: May 1, 2015

Tomorrowland (Disney)

Website: http://movies.disney.com/ tomorrowland

Rating: TBD

Release date: May 22, 2015

Ooohh… just released a trailer for this during the Super Bowl!

Inside Out (Pixar)

Website: http://movies.disney.com/ inside-out

Rating: TBD

Release date: June 19, 2015

Ant-Man (Marvel)

Website: http://marvel.com/antman

Rating: TBD

U.S. Release date: July 17, 2015

Finest Hours (Disney)

Rating: TBD

Release date: October 9, 2015

In February of 1952, one of the worst storms to ever hit the East Coast struck New England, damaging an oil tanker off the coast of Cape Cod and literally ripping it in half. On a small lifeboat faced with frigid temperatures and 70-foot high waves, four members of the Coast Guard set out to rescue the more than 30 stranded sailors trapped aboard the rapidly-sinking vessel. “The Finest Hours” is the story of their heroic mission, which is still considered the greatest small boat rescue in Coast Guard history.

Untitled Cold War Spy Thriller (DreamWorks)

Rating: TBD

Release date: October 16, 2015

Tom Hanks stars in Steven Spielberg’s Untitled Cold War spy thriller, which is the true story of James Donovan (Tom Hanks), an attorney who finds himself thrust into the center of the Cold War when the CIA sends him on the near-impossible mission to negotiate the release of a captured American U-2 pilot.

The Good Dinosaur (Pixar)

Website: www.facebook.com/ PixarTheGoodDinosaur

Rating: TBD

Release Date: November 25, 2015

Star Wars: The Force Awakens (Lucasfilm)

Rating: TBD

Release Date: December 18, 2015

Star Wars: The Force Awakens opens in theaters December 18, 2015. Star Wars: The Force Awakens is directed by J.J. Abrams from a screenplay by Lawrence Kasdan & Abrams, and features a cast including actors John Boyega, Daisy Ridley, Adam Driver, Oscar Isaac, Andy Serkis, Academy Award winner Lupita Nyong’o, Gwendoline Christie, Crystal Clarke, Pip Andersen, Domhnall Gleeson, and Max von Sydow. They will join the original stars of the saga, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Mark Hamill, Anthony Daniels, Peter Mayhew, and Kenny Baker. The film is being produced by Kathleen Kennedy, J.J. Abrams, and Bryan Burk, and John Williams returns as the composer. Star Wars: The Force Awakens is Episode VII in the Star Wars Saga.

*o* *o* *o*
